name: Satanicpornocultshop
description: '''Satanicpornocultshop''' is a Japanese experimental music group making assemblage-style compositions that incorporate a variety of musical styles and techniques. The group draws heavily on hip hop and electronic influences to create "bricolage hip hop" inspired by the theories of [[Claude LÃ©vi-Strauss]]. Beginning in the early 2010s, the group began focusing on Juke and Footwork music, influenced by the Chicago scene.
